summary: This document is a summary of account balances for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust at Deutsche Bank for the period of March 1, 2018, to March 31, 2018. It details the account balance, transactions, and service charges during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the beneficiary of the insurance trust mentioned in the document.

persons.name: Stewart Oktfield
persons.context: Stewart Oktfield is mentioned as a contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 575 Lexington Ave, 4th Fl, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The document summarizes the account balance for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust.
The account had a beginning balance of $2,276.65 and an ending balance of $276.65 as of March 31, 2018.
There were no significant transactions during the period, with only service charges of $50.00.
Stewart Oktfield is listed as a contact for inquiries regarding the account.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
